title: Apple and Amazon have different visions of the future. Neither is totally right
description: Both Amazon and Apple see the world through the prism of their own advances. That's a strength - and a weakness.

title: The 5 best driveway alarms of 2022
description: Driveway alarms can notify you whenever there's movement in your driveway. They're an added layer of protection if you're looking to improve your home security. ZDNET found the best ones, and we tell you which ones can alert you via phone of potential disturbances.

title: American Airlines may end a real customer advantage for a sad, twisted reason
description: When your airline is offering something better than, say, Delta or United, why would you change? Because of this?

title: You can get a refurbished 128GB Microsoft Surface Laptop for $320
